metaDescription: Overview for banks, brokers and financial advisors who cooperate with MyHome24App for property financing.
title: Financing partner dashboard
subtitle: This will become your central space for leads, statistics and the integration of your own financing processes.

stats.title: Current overview (demo)
stats.hint: The numbers are placeholders and will later be replaced with real data from your partner profile and MyHome24App leads.

profile.title: Your profile on MyHome24App
profile.text: Keep your contact details, regions and product focus up to date so that users can quickly find the right contact person.
items: Bank or company profile with logo and short description
Define regional focus and target groups
Store named contacts with direct phone number and e-mail

integration.title: Digital integration
integration.text: In the future you will be able to integrate your own tools and forms – for example pre-applications, document upload or appointment booking.
items: Link to your own online forms
Option for API integration in a later expansion stage
Export of leads into your internal systems (planned)

compliance.title: Legal framework
compliance.text: MyHome24App helps to display financing information transparently but does not replace statutory information and advisory duties.
items: Notes on information duties under German law
Clear separation between non-binding guidance and offers
Cooperation only with regulated financial institutions

roadmap.title: Roadmap – what is planned next
roadmap.text: The partner area is under construction. These are the next steps so that you can use MyHome24App as a professional platform.

items.title: Leads from concrete listing enquiries
items.text: Linking users from the mortgage calculator and specific listings directly to your partner profile.

items.title: Dedicated login area for partners
items.text: Manage contacts, regions, products and notifications directly inside the dashboard.

items.title: Analytics & performance overview
items.text: Simple analytics on incoming requests, successful closings and frequently used products.

roadmap.disclaimer: The functions on this page are still being built and currently serve as a preview only. Concrete integrations and access details will be agreed individually.
